ModMetaData.name: Multiplayer Compatibility
ModMetaData.author: notfood
ModMetaData.description: Miscellaneous patches to make Multiplayer work Mod Support: - Animals Logic - Genetic Rim - GiddyUP Core - GiddyUp RideAndRoll - GiddyUp BattleMounts - Hospitality - Path Avoid - Power Switch - Simple Sidearms - Stuffed Floors - Time of day Switch - Toggle Refuelable
